Misconfigurations.Title: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one lowercase character.
Misconfigurations.Description: IAM account password policies should ensure that passwords content including at least one lowercase character.
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

Violations.Message: Password policy does not require lowercase characters

Misconfigurations.Title: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one number in the password.
Misconfigurations.Description: IAM account password policies should ensure that passwords content including at least one number.
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

Violations.Message: Password policy does not require numbers.

Misconfigurations.Title: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one symbol in the password.
Misconfigurations.Description: IAM account password policies should ensure that passwords content including a symbol.
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

Violations.Message: Password policy does not require symbols.

Misconfigurations.Title: IAM Password policy should have requirement for at least one uppercase character.
Misconfigurations.Description:
,

IAM account password policies should ensure that passwords content including at least one uppercase character.
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

Violations.Message: Password policy does not require uppercase characters.

Misconfigurations.Title: IAM Password policy should have minimum password length of 14 or more characters.
Misconfigurations.Description:
IAM account password policies should ensure that passwords have a minimum length.

The account password policy should be set to enforce minimum password length of at least 14 characters.
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Enforce longer, more complex passwords in the policy

Violations.Message: Password policy allows a maximum password age of greater than 90 days

Misconfigurations.Title: IAM Password policy should prevent password reuse.
Misconfigurations.Description:
IAM account password policies should prevent the reuse of passwords.

The account password policy should be set to prevent using any of the last five used passwords.
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Prevent password reuse in the policy

Violations.Message: Password policy allows reuse of recent passwords.
